channel.title: The Ruby Show
channel.description: Once known as Rails Envy, The Ruby Show is one of the most popular and longest running Ruby podcasts, with news and discussion about the latest topics in the Ruby and Rails communities.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Ruby Show
channel.itunes:author: Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper
channel.itunes:summary: Once known as Rails Envy, The Ruby Show is one of the most popular and longest running Ruby podcasts, with news and discussion about the latest topics in the Ruby and Rails communities.

item.title: Ruby 1.9.3-p392
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode of The Ruby Show, Jason and Peter talk about the latest Ruby release, Rails security releases, and the usual round up of interesting projects.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Ruby Show, Jason and Peter talk about the latest Ruby release, Rails security releases, and the usual round up of interesting projects.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of The Ruby Show, Jason and Peter talk about the latest Ruby release, Rails security releases, and the usual round up of interesting projects.
item.itunes:keywords: ruby, news, rubyonrails, rails, rails3, gems, rubygems, the ruby show

item.title: Rails 3.0.20 and 2.3.16
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Jason and Peter talk about the latest security updates to Rails, Threads in Ruby, and the usual round up of interesting blog posts.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Jason and Peter talk about the latest security updates to Rails, Threads in Ruby, and the usual round up of interesting blog posts.

item.title: Ruby 1.9.3-p374
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Jason and Peter talk about the latest Ruby release, developing iOS applications with Ruby, Kids Ruby, and the usual round up of interesting projects and posts.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Jason and Peter talk about the latest Ruby release, developing iOS applications with Ruby, Kids Ruby, and the usual round up of interesting projects and posts.

item.title: Rails Security Updates
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the latest Rails security releases (upgrade now!), Ruby 2.0.0 preview 1, and some cool new projects.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the latest Rails security releases (upgrade now!), Ruby 2.0.0 preview 1, and some cool new projects.

item.itunes:keywords: ruby, news, rubyonrails, rails, rails3, gems, rubygems, the ruby show

item.title: Ruby 1.9.3-p362
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the latest patch level release of Ruby, Rails 4 changes, and the usual round up of interesting projects and posts. Peter's audio is a bit off this week due to a recording error on our part but it will be back to normal next week.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the latest patch level release of Ruby, Rails 4 changes, and the usual round up of interesting projects and posts.
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the latest patch level release of Ruby, Rails 4 changes, and the usual round up of interesting projects and posts.
Peter's audio is a bit off this week due to a recording error on our part but it will be back to normal next week.
item.itunes:keywords: ruby, news, rubyonrails, rails, rails3, gems, rubygems, the ruby show

item.title: The British Ruby Conference
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Peter and Jason discuss the British Ruby Conference, Ruby 1.9.3-p327, Capybara 2.0.0, and more. Also, huge apologies for Jason's audio quality in this episode. There was a hiss that showed up after recording that couldn't be fixed. Listen at your own risk!
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Peter and Jason discuss the British Ruby Conference, Ruby 1.9.3-p327, Capybara 2.0.0, and more. Also, huge apologies for Jason's audio quality in this episode. There was a hiss that showed up after recording that couldn't be fixed. Listen
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, Peter and Jason discuss the British Ruby Conference, Ruby 1.9.3-p327, Capybara 2.0.0, and more.
Also, huge apologies for Jason's audio quality in this episode. There was a hiss that showed up after recording that couldn't be fixed. Listen at your own risk!
item.itunes:keywords: ruby, news, rubyonrails, rails, rails3, gems, rubygems, the ruby show

item.title: Rubinius 2.0.0.rc1
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the Ruby 2.0 walkthrough, Rails 4.0, Rubinius 2.0.0.rc1, and much more. Check out Peter's Kickstarter for the Ruby 2.0 walkthrough!
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the Ruby 2.0 walkthrough, Rails 4.0, Rubinius 2.0.0.rc1, and much more.
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, Peter and Jason talk about the Ruby 2.0 walkthrough, Rails 4.0, Rubinius 2.0.0.rc1, and much more.
Check out Peter's Kickstarter for the Ruby 2.0 walkthrough!
item.itunes:keywords: ruby, news, rubyonrails, rails, rails3, gems, rubygems, the ruby show

item.title: Ruby 2.0 preview 1
item.author: me@jasonseifer.com (Jason Seifer and Peter Cooper)
item.description: In this episode of The Ruby Show, Jason and Peter talk about Ruby 2.0 preview 1, Ruby Under a Microscope, Rails Best Practices, and more.
item.itunes:author: hi@rubyshow.com (The Ruby Show)
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Ruby Show, Jason and Peter talk about Ruby 2.0 preview 1, Ruby Under a Microscope, Rails Best Practices, and more.
